description: Exceptionally well organized; strong work ethics and willingness to work hard to achieve employer objectives.
Fluent in PC, Mac and other cloud based development and testing environment.
Certified in computer programming, graphics, audio, animation and web design.
Abundant experience applying graphic design principles to produce innovative and tastefully documents and web sites cross browsers and platforms.

High Efficiency in using Adobe Creative Suite 5.5 including Photoshop, Flash, Captivate, Dream Weaver, Premiere Pro, Audition, Media Encoder and other commonly used tools related to Front-End design and development.

Advanced training and experience in the application and usage of tools/game engines such as Microsoft Office, Visual Studio 2010, Eclipse, Sublime Text, Xcode, Maya, 3Ds Max, Unity, XNA, Neverwinter Nights 2, and Unreal 3 etc.

Experienced with Java, C++, C#, ActionScript 2.0, 3.0, JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, Objective C, ASP.net , JSP and SQL skills related to template constructing. Strong skills in understanding web related coding languages in general.
Effective skills in Cross-Browser design/Responsive Web Design using CSS, HTML, CSS3, HTML5, SASS, Compass, LESS. Strong abilities in fast prototyping for proofing of concept.

Experienced with media encoding, Section 508 Compliance for various platforms, web tracking and marketing using Google Analytics, Omniture, Test&Target and development within variety of content management systems.

Big fan of trending web ideas, technologies and tools. Familiar with and working on to learn more about: RWD, Git, CoffeeScript, backbone.js, DivShot, Codenvy IDE, Fluid UI, Chrome Remote Desktop and Evernote etc.
